description:
Tree works in front and rear gardens.  Works:- 

 (T155)          Sycamore:  Remove branch growing towards                 street light, remove deadwood. 

 (T156 + T158)   2 x Sycamore (dead):  Fell to ground level                 and grind and stump. 

 (T159)          Lime:   Thin crown by 15%, remove epicormic                 growth. 

 (T197)          Sycamore:  Lift and prune to clear adjacent                 by 2m, deadwood. 

                 Sycamore at Rear:  Cut back to clear                 building by 2-3m, thin 25%.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: All the work is to be carried out by a competent Tree Surgeon to the recommendation of BS 3998: 1989 'Tree Work'. 

 REASON: To protect the health and stability of trees to be retained on the site, and to ensure that a satisfactory standard of visual amenity is provided and maintained.
